sentences.en: Before us stretched a vista of the sluggish river, ending in glimpses of a reed - fringed lagoon.
sentences.cn: 我们的前面是一条缓缓流动的长河, 注入那隐约可见的芦苇环绕的湖泊之中.

sentences.en: Exchange programs open up new vistas for students.
sentences.cn: 交流计划为学生展现了新的前景。

sentences.en: From my bedroom window I looked out on a crowded vista of hills and rooftops.
sentences.cn: 我从卧室窗口望去，远处尽是连绵的山峦和屋顶。

sentences.en: He could see through the windows a vista of green fields.
sentences.cn: 透过窗户他可以看到碧绿的田野风光.

sentences.en: He looked back once, up that endless vista of autumn lane between the yellowing hedges.
sentences.cn: 他一度回头望望夹在变黄树篱中间的那条无穷无尽的秋色小径.

sentences.en: He saw the patrol ahead in a gloomy vista of fatigue and danger and misery.
sentences.cn: 他感到这一去前途黯淡,等待着他们的不外是奔波劳累,艰危磨难.

sentences.en: I, however, was fascinated by the vista over the sea.
sentences.cn: 我却为此时此刻海上的景色所吸引住了.

sentences.en: It afforded a vista pleasant to contemplate.
People weary of Vista's mindless restrictions should not hesitate to upgrade.
sentences.cn: 厌烦Vista盲目限制的人,应该毫不犹豫升级.

sentences.en: The days stretch out in an endless vista.
sentences.cn: 时日在无穷的展望中延展着.

sentences.en: This flitting cheerfulness was always at the further extremity of some long vista through the forest.
sentences.cn: 这种转瞬即逝的欢快,总是闪现在森林纵深的远端.

sentences.en: This street offers a fine vista of the cathedral.
sentences.cn: 这条街的尽头是个大教堂,远远望去非常好看.

sentences.en: Vista : Narrowing Gaps between Dream and Reality?
Vista took five years and $ 6 billion to develop.
sentences.cn: Vista的 开发花费了60亿美元和5年的时间.

sentences.en: Vista was meant to clean up all this debris.
sentences.cn: Vista的 开发目的之一就是要把这些沉渣从操作系统里清除出去.

sentences.en: Windows PCs are no longer burdened with the disliked Vista OS.
sentences.cn: 不受欢迎的Vista操作系统也已不会在Windows电脑中露面了.

trans.tran_cn: 远景，狭长的街景，追溯往事，展望，回顾
trans.tran_en: a view of a large area of beautiful scenery
